00047 using namespace Hypertable;

00050 namespace {

00052   const char *usage[] = {
00053     "usage: serverup [options] <servername>",
00054     "",
00055     "  options:",
00056     "    --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file",
00057     "                     is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel",
00058     "                     install directory",
00059     "    --host=<name>    Connect to the server running on host <name>",
00060     "    --port=<n>       Connect to the server running on port <n>",
00061     "    --help           Display this help text and exit",
00062     "    --verbose,-v     Display 'true' if up, 'false' otherwise",
00063     "",
00064     "  This program check checks to see if the server, specified by <servername>,",
00065     "  is up.  It does this by determining the host and port that the server is",
00066     "  listening on from the command line options, or if not supplied, from the",
00067     "  the config file.  It then establishes a connection with the server and,",
00068     "  sends a STATUS request.  If the response from the STATUS request is OK,",
00069     "  then the program terminates with an exit status of 0.  If a failure occurs,",
00070     "  or a non-OK error code is returned from the STATUS request, the program",
00071     "  terminates with an exit status of 1.  <servername> may be one of the",
00072     "  following values:",
00073     "",
00074     "  dfsbroker",
00075     "  hyperspace",
00076     "  master",
00077     "  rangeserver",
00078     "",
00079     (const char *)0
00080   };
00081   
00082 }

00088 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00089   string configFile = "";
00090   string serverName = "";
00091   string hostName = "";
00092   int port = 0;
00093   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00094   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00095   const char *hostProperty = 0;
00096   const char *portProperty = 0;
00097   const char *portStr = 0;
00098   Comm *comm = 0;
00099   ConnectionManagerPtr connManagerPtr;
00100   DfsBroker::Client *client;
00101   Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspacePtr;
00102   RangeServerClient *rangeServer;
00103   ApplicationQueuePtr appQueuePtr;
00104   int error;
00105   bool verbose = false;
00106 
00107   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00108   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00109 
00110   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00111     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00112       configFile = &argv[i][9];
00113     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--host=", 7))
00114       hostName = &argv[i][7];
00115     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7))
00116       portStr = &argv[i][7];
00117     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00118       verbose = true;
00119     else if (argv[i][0] == '-' || serverName != "")
00120       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00121     else
00122       serverName = argv[i];
00123   }
00124 
00125   if (configFile == "")
00126     configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00127 
00128   props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00129 
00130   if (serverName == "dfsbroker") {
00131     hostProperty = "DfsBroker.Host";
00132     portProperty = "DfsBroker.Port";
00133   }
00134   else if (serverName == "hyperspace") {
00135     hostProperty = "Hyperspace.Master.Host";
00136     portProperty = "Hyperspace.Master.Port";
00137   }
00138   else if (serverName == "master") {
00139     hostProperty = "Hypertable.Master.Host";
00140     portProperty = "Hypertable.Master.Port";
00141   }
00142   else if (serverName == "rangeserver") {
00143     if (hostName == "")
00144       hostName = "localhost";
00145     portProperty = "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port";
00146   }
00147   else
00148     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00149 
00150   {
00151     if (hostName == "")
00152       hostName = props_ptr->get(hostProperty, "localhost");
00153     else if (serverName != "rangeserver")
00154       props_ptr->set(hostProperty, hostName.c_str());
00155 
00156     if (portStr != 0)
00157       props_ptr->set(portProperty, portStr);
00158 
00159     port = props_ptr->get_int(portProperty, 0);
00160     if (port == 0 || port < 1024 || port >= 65536) {
00161       HT_ERRORF("%s not specified or out of range : %d", portProperty, port);
00162       return 1;
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, hostName.c_str(), (uint16_t)port))
00166       goto abort;
00167   }
00168 
00169   props_ptr->set("silent", "true");
00170 
00171   comm = new Comm();
00172   connManagerPtr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00173   connManagerPtr->set_quiet_mode(true);
00174 
00175   if (serverName == "dfsbroker") {
00176     client = new DfsBroker::Client(connManagerPtr, addr, 30);
00177     if (!client->wait_for_connection(2))
00178       goto abort;
00179     if ((error = client->status()) != Error::OK)
00180       goto abort;
00181   }
00182   else if (serverName == "hyperspace") {
00183     hyperspacePtr = new Hyperspace::Session(connManagerPtr->get_comm(), props_ptr, 0);
00184     if (!hyperspacePtr->wait_for_connection(2))
00185       goto abort;
00186     if ((error = hyperspacePtr->status()) != Error::OK)
00187       goto abort;
00188   }
00189   else if (serverName == "master") {
00190     MasterClientPtr  masterPtr;
00191 
00192     hyperspacePtr = new Hyperspace::Session(connManagerPtr->get_comm(), props_ptr, 0);
00193 
00194     if (!hyperspacePtr->wait_for_connection(2))
00195       goto abort;
00196 
00197     appQueuePtr = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00198     masterPtr = new MasterClient(connManagerPtr, hyperspacePtr, 30, appQueuePtr);
00199     masterPtr->set_verbose_flag(false);
00200     if (masterPtr->initiate_connection(0) != Error::OK)
00201       goto abort;
00202 
00203     if (!masterPtr->wait_for_connection(2))
00204       goto abort;
00205 
00206     if ((error = masterPtr->status()) != Error::OK)
00207       goto abort;
00208   }
00209   else if (serverName == "rangeserver") {
00210     connManagerPtr->add(addr, 30, "Range Server");
00211     if (!connManagerPtr->wait_for_connection(addr, 2))
00212       goto abort;
00213     rangeServer = new RangeServerClient(comm, 30);
00214     try {
00215       rangeServer->status(addr);
00216     }
00217     catch (Exception &e) {
00218       goto abort;
00219     }
00220   }
00221 
00222   if (verbose)
00223     cout << "true" << endl;
00224   return 0;
00225 
00226  abort:
00227   if (verbose)
00228     cout << "false" << endl;
00229   return 1;
00230 }
